name: The Red Mamba
description:
Hey! Find the lost treasure of Lor'hem Ip'shum! Go deep into the forgotten jungle and through the  depths of ancient ruins of Lor'hem temple. The adventure awaits you!

Control:

  • press LEFT or RIGHT to run
  • press SPACE to jump
  • press DOWN to crouch
  • press ENTER to switch/push
  • press M to enable/disable music
  • press S to enable/disable sounds
  • press R to restart the scene
